steps: 1. Remove the crucible from the furnace once cooled. 2. Carefully extract the solidified sample from the crucible. 3. Use a diamond saw to cut the sample to the desired dimensions of 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches. 4. If necessary, sand the edges and surfaces to achieve a smooth finish, using progressively finer grits of sandpaper. 5. Optionally, apply a sealant to protect the surface from oxidation.
